ghostPost.title: v1.5.1
ghostPost.html:
Recent changes around Heroku release commands broke Heroku deploy button. This release fixes the following.

  • Fix the Heroku deploy button
  • Fix undefined method compare_and_save (Author: @mzch)
ghostPost.excerpt:
Recent changes around Heroku release commands broke Heroku deploy button. This
release fixes the following.

 * Fix the Heroku deploy button
 * Fix undefined method compare_and_save (Author: @mzch)
